oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oak Grove AME Church cemetery
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oak Grove African Methodist Episcopal Zion Church and Cemetery

Black and white photograph of the rear view of a church in distance from an elevated position; church built into hill; rear elevation has a cement ramp to a white door and one rectangle window; front elevation has gable roof; near back door are several gravestones with wreaths and other gravestones are scattered across hill; in background are trees and a road intersection
Oak Grove AME Zion Church was established in 1915.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee; African American cemeteries -- Tennessee
Churches; Cemeteries
